name: MPSImageConvolution
desc: A filter that convolves an image with a given kernel of odd width and height.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int, weights: UnsafePointer<Float>)
var kernelHeight: Int
items.desc: The height of the filter window. Must be an odd number.

items.name: var kernelWidth: Int
items.desc: The width of the filter window. Must be an odd number.

items.name: var bias: Float
items.desc: The value added to a convolved pixel before it is converted back to its intended storage format.
